Dm_ZO_0017_Text_025_b:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:SurpriseL_01>That must be the meaning behind
"watery bridge." Yes, it must!
Dm_ZO_0017_Text_014_b:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>If we climb this waterfall, we shall ascend
into the sky!
Dm_ZO_0017_Text_023_b:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Determination_00><clr:ffff>If you wear your <clr:0000>Zora armor<clr:ffff>, you can
climb the waterfall as well! Let us be
off to our next adventure, Link!
Dm_ZO_0017_Text_021_b:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Happy_01>Well... In any case, we now have a
path forward. All that is left is to press
ever onward!
Dm_ZO_0017_Text_010_b: <sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:SurpriseS_00>Link, what happened? Is this your doing?
Dm_ZO_0017_Text_026_b:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Determination_00>Link! If you wear the <clr:0000>Zora armor<clr:ffff>, you can
climb the waterfall as well!

You must acquire said armor from Yona
at Mipha Court!
Dm_ZO_0017_Text_009_b:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_00>A waterfall! A waterfall descended from
the sky!
Dm_ZO_0017_Text_024_b:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Convinced_00>Link! I knew you could do it! My belief in
you is as well placed as ever.
Dm_ZO_0017_Text_013_b:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:QuestionNormal_01>Hm...<sp:5:1:0> Ah! I believe I understand!


To a Zora, a waterfall is no different from
a path.
Dm_ZO_0017_Text_022_b:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Determination_00>With your <clr:0000>Zora armor<clr:ffff>, you can climb the
waterfall as well! Let us be off to our next
adventure, Link!
Dm_ZO_0017_Text_011_b:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Think_01>Aha!<sp:5:0:0> So you activated a mysterious device
in the ruins...
Dm_ZO_0017_Text_020_b:
<sp:3:0:2:0501>Is someone calling to me? What was that
sound I just heard...
